elements.name: realEstateDescription
elements.title: Description of asset
elements.description:
If possible, include the:
  • property address
  • registered owner(s)
  • PID, and
  • legal description

elements.name: ExplanationRealEstate
elements.title: For property in BC, you can find a description and assessed value on your most recent Assessment Notice for your real estate. You can also look it up at www.bcassessment.ca.

elements.name: realEstateValue
elements.title: Current value of asset
elements.description:
You may be the only owner of an asset, or you may be a joint owner. For assets that you jointly own, you must only put the value for the part that you own.

Remember, the mortgage is listed under your debts. Include only the market value of the asset.
